tool_description: Simply store and retrieve data in the cloud for IoT devices.
title: IoT data

api_list.name: IoT Data - Set
api_list.description: Set IoT data from included body, with topic as key. Data needs to be formatted as JSON.

api_list.name: IoT Data - Get
api_list.description: Retrieve data previously stored as JSON, with topic as key.

api_list.name: IoT Data - Set
api_list.description: Set IoT data from included body, with topic as key. Data needs to be formatted as JSON.
